## ControlFieldComponent.requiredSelector property

Selector for the required status of the control. Use with [FormStateResolver](./dynamic-forms.formstateresolver.md) to retrieve observable value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
requiredSelector?: Immutable<AllowedFormStateSelector<boolean | undefined, any, any>>;
```
